enable.title: Enable Steam integration
enable.description: Enable or disable Steam integration in the application.

apiKey.title: Steam API Key
apiKey.description: To use Steam integration, you need to provide your Steam API key. You can get it from the Steam developer portal.

accountName.title: Account name
accountName.description: Enter a name if you have multipe accout. Leave blank to use default

customPath.title: Custom installation path
customPath.description: Leave off if you're using the default steam installation path
